description: The Willow Bell (Campanula persicifolia 'Kelly's Gold') is an amazing species of perennial flower that delights with its abundant foliage and abundant yellow-tinted, bell-shaped flowers. A low-maintenance plant that thrives in well-drained soil and part shade, it blooms from late spring through summer, creating a stunning show of yellow petals. The Willow Bell is an excellent option for adding colour to rock gardens, borders, and paths. Its neat growth habit and compact size make it perfect for container gardening, as it will not spread or get too large. Finely serrated foliage add texture and interest to its soft, delicate petals, making it a truly remarkable plant.
